# Carregando pacotes

```{r}
library(zoo)
library(xts)
library(tsDyn)
library(urca)
```

# Carregando dados

```{r}
df <- read.csv(
  "/dados/Dissertacao/Modelo/SeriesTemporais/Dados_yeojohnson.csv",
  encoding="UTF-8", 
  stringsAsFactors=FALSE
  )
df <- ts(data = df, start = c(1987,03), frequency = 4)
df <- as.xts(df)
```
